description: Network of local pantries and senior meal programs serving the Bronzeville area.

description: Serves both the Bronzeville and Park Manor neighborhoods with weekly food assistance.

description: Community pantry and senior meal support for Bronzeville residents.

name: Mandela Market Place / Bronzeville Community Garden
